results.title: Recurrence of unilateral angioedema of the tongue: A case report
results.text_hl: ...The ACE inhibitor (@<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@) was suspected to be the cause of @<m>DISEASE_Angioedema</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000799 @@@angioedema@@@; therefore, its use was discontinued.

citations.NLM: Matsuhisa Y, Kenzaka T, Shimizu H, Hirose H, Gotoh T. Recurrence of unilateral angioedema of the tongue: A case report World J Clin Cases. 2023 Sep 26;11(27):6603-6612. PMID: 37900225

results.title: Case Report: Post-operative Angioedema After a Laryngeal Mask Airway Application
results.text_hl: A preliminary diagnosis of @<m>DISEASE_Angioedema</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000799 @@@AE@@@ was made considering the history of chronic @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ therapy.

results.title: A Fatal Case of Lisinopril-Induced Acute Necrotizing Pancreatitis
results.text_hl: Commonly cited adverse effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ include @DISEASE_Hyperkalemia @DISEASE_MESH:D006947 @@@hyperkalemia@@@, @DISEASE_Acute_Kidney_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D058186 @@@acute kidney injury@@@, and @<m>DISEASE_Angioedema</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000799 @@@angioedema@@@, and while uncommon, there have been reports of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@-induced @DISEASE_Pancreatitis_Acute_Necrotizing @DISEASE_MESH:D019283 @@@necrotizing pancreatitis@@@ in the literature.

citations.NLM: Masarweh OM, Al-Moussally F, Meruvia Garron JP, Kunadia A, Karasik O, Asmar A. A Fatal Case of Lisinopril-Induced Acute Necrotizing Pancreatitis Cureus. 2023 Jun;15(6):e40071. PMID: 37304386
citations.BibTeX: @article{37304386, title={A Fatal Case of Lisinopril-Induced Acute Necrotizing Pancreatitis}, author={Masarweh OM and Al-Moussally F and Meruvia Garron JP and Kunadia A and Karasik O and Asmar A}, journal={Cureus}, volume={15}, number={6}, pages={e40071}}

results.title: Angioedema Caused by Drugs That Prevent the Degradation of Vasoactive Peptides: A Pharmacovigilance Database Study
results.text_hl: ...Signals of @<m>DISEASE_Angioedema</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000799 @@@angioedema@@@ for the following @GENE_ACE @GENE_1636 @@@ACE@@@ inhibitors (total) (IC025: 2.19) were detected: @CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@enalapril@@@ (IC025: 2.06), @CHEMICAL_imidapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:C065166 @@@imidapril@@@ (IC025: 2.38), @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ IC025: 1.55), @CHEMICAL_temocapril_hydrochloride @CHEMICAL_MESH:C055603 @@@temocapril@@@ (IC025: 0.29), and @CHEMICAL_trandolapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:C052035 @@@trandolapril@@@ (IC025: 0.19) (Table 3).

citations.NLM: Noguchi Y, Murayama A, Esaki H, Sugioka M, Koyama A, Tachi T, Teramachi H. Angioedema Caused by Drugs That Prevent the Degradation of Vasoactive Peptides: A Pharmacovigilance Database Study J Clin Med. 2021 Nov 25;10(23):. PMID: 34884209
